metadata.Title: SoilTemperatureSWAT
metadata.Extended description: Strategy implementing the SWAT method to compute soil temperature by layers using damping depth dynamics and a lag coefficient, driven by soil profile depth, bulk density, volumetric water content, and annual mean air temperature. Reference: Neitsch S.L., Arnold J.G., Kiniry J.R., Williams J.R., King K.W. Soil and Water Assessment Tool. Theoretical documentation. Version 2000. http://swatmodel.tamu.edu/media/1290/swat2000theory.pdf
metadata.Short description: Computes daily soil temperature by layer using the SWAT damping depth approach with a lag coefficient.
